title: Logs Problem
body: Please help me with my problem. It keeps on saying that there is a problem. Check for logs for more information. I just want to play League. Been 5 months. Keep having this problem.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having issues patching. There are a number of reasons the patcher would run into issues and our[ Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide goes over the most common solutions. 

Give that a go and let me know if those steps helped.

I actually went over that earlier, and tried out different solution from Youtube. It did not work at all. It keeps on saying "Unspecified error occurred. Please see logs for more information.", and I don't know what to do. I just need help with it.

Since you're still having issues after working through the Patching Issues guide, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

In order to ensure our techs have all the information they need to assist you, I suggest you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your request.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I successfully did what you said. Thank you so much for staying with me. I hope this really helps.
